Project.name: History Panel Demo for AS3
Project.Description: This demo illustrates the use of the AS3 Undo utility your PureMVC-based Flex application.
Project.ReleaseNotes:
Summary of Changes in 1.1
  • Updated layout to general PureMVC demo style.
  • Put the canvas in a panel, with Ctrl-Z/Ctrl-Y usage note in status
  • Added hint to canvas to move, resize, stretch and rotate images.
  • Removed unused HistoryPanel, HistoryPanelMediator and registration
  • Refactored Mediator constructor activity to onRegister. CLH
Features in Version 1.0.1
  • Updated a fix for the GraphicItemMediator: the name of the mediator is now: NAME + graphicItemVO.uid
Features in Version 1.0
  • Alpha 1 version:
  • Move , Rotate, Resize graphic items
  • Use keyboard shortcuts to undo ( Ctrl + Z ) and redo ( Ctrl + Y )
Project.Installation:
Installing the Project Source Code From the archive
  • Download the latest source code archive.
  • Unzip the source code zip to any folder on your disk.
  • For instance: c:\development\
  • You will see a HistoryPanel_X_Y (where X_Y is version) source folder.
  • For instance: c:\development\HistoryPanel_X_Y
From the Repository
  • Use your favorite SVN client to retrieve the latest source code release from the repository.
Setup and Compile the Demo Using Flex Builder 3
  • Create a new Flex Project called 'HistoryPanel' in Flex Builder 3, pointing to the new HistoryPanel_X_Y source folder.
  • Add the required libraries to the project's build path.
  • From the Flex Builder menu do: Project -> Properties -> Flex Build Path -> Library Path -> Add SWC Folder
  • Browse and select: HistoryPanel/libs
  • Run HistoryPanel.mxml
